page.title: 01PORT LOGAN AND SURROUNDINGS
page.content: Port Logan, Wigtownshire, is a rural community business with no manufacturing businesses. The surrounding area is entirely agricultural with cattle and dairy produce as the main output. Arable land is used for grain and grass for use as animal fodder. the main tourist attractions are the beach, at Port Logan, and the Logan Fish Pond where sea fish are kept in captivity and can be hand fed. The coastline of this block is primarily sandy in Port Logan Bay with rocky shores to the north and south of the bay.
